pullRequest.title: Implemented private log filter JSON-RPC methods
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #627
Implemented the following JSON-RPC methods:
• priv_installFilter
• priv_uninstallFilter
• priv_getFilterLogs
• priv_getFilterChanges
ATs will be implemented in a separate PR.
